name: Women's 'Eternity' Suit (Black/Gold)
description:
Designer: Sennda of Emrayur

The ‘Eternity’ suit is a bold statement of fashion forward thinking, only worn by those brave enough to don this form fitting attire. Each piece is handcrafted from the softest genetically enhanced livestock leather, dyed a luxurious metallic black, and embedded with specialized nanofibers to give it a unique brilliant finish. Golden detailing and deep black accents complete the look, which can be worn on its own, or with the matching sleeve and collar suit top.
